eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Benewah; Bonner; Boundary; Clearwater; Idaho; Kootenai; Latah; Lewis; Nez Perce; Shoshone, ID; Lincoln; Sanders, MT; Adams; Asotin; Columbia; Ferry; Garfield; Lincoln; Pend Oreille; Spokane; Stevens; Whitman, WA; AT 09:52 AM ON OCT 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:52 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System of the Inland Northwest area. In the event of an actual emergency, broadcasters would be bringing you important public safety information.
